gipfs, when requesting a file from omlnk, only gets its specific git objects, which are linked with other chunks containing same common bytes

Peepz: account content creators, save draft and share to team

DML: common bytes db at start of document, instead of repeating same things

Peepz activity json: put an newer activity with a older, for better organization of events (such as tbtc transactions)

Dapps: tell when it is clln centralized things (such as APIs)
